name: Low Levels
description:
Made in 48 hours for the StartupCitiesJam.

Play in fullscreen

In a medieval world where everyone is a level 100 boss, the slime population starts to dwindle since nobody farms them any more. Now you, a lowly level 1 crook, must make your way up by massacring slimes that reproduce when killed, which actually makes you die in the end anyway, but at least the slimes won't go extinct and you leveled up, right?
